      • addTab

        public TextArea addTab()
        Adds a tab with a blank TextArea at the end of the components array;
        Returns:
        the TextArea added.

      • addTab

        public TextArea addTab(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String text)
        Adds a tab with a TextArea created with the passed arguments.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new TextArea's document.
        path - the path of the new TextArea's document.
        text - the content of the new TextArea's document.
        Returns:
        the TextArea added.

      • addTab

        public TextArea addTab(TextDocument document)

      • getDocumentAt

        public TextArea getDocumentAt(int index)
        Works like JTabbedPane.getSelectedComponent() but casts the component to TextArea before returning.
        Returns:
        the TextArea inside the GenericScrollPane on the index.

      • getSelectedComponent

        public TextArea getSelectedComponent()
        Works like JTabbedPane.getSelectedComponent() but casts the component to TextArea before returning.
        Overrides:
        getSelectedComponent in class javax.swing.JTabbedPane
        Returns:
        the TextArea inside the selected tab's GenericScrollPane.

      • setTitleStarAt

        public void setTitleStarAt(int index,
                  boolean b)
        Adds or removes the tab's title (referenced by index a '*' as the first character.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the tab.
        b - if true adds a '*' (if the string don't already starts with one). Removes, case false.
